body_html: It would also have to handle parameter groups, as now different lr's and other args can be applied to different parameters. Also, first time running torch.cat-like kernel can be unexpectedly slow, as it cudaMallocHost's memory for TensorInfo of all the tensors, IIRC. And it could keep allocating if lists of bigger sizes are passed.
